about_the_game:
This is a costume DLC for the characters in Mirror 2: Project X. You can choose to change to DLC costumes in the game.

This DLC includes:
1. Two sets of swimsuits for Leah.
2. Two sets of swimsuits for Rita.
3. Two sets of swimsuits for Lani.
4. Three sets of swimsuits for Caiyun.
5. Two sets of swimsuits for Qianxi.

Instructions:
After installing the DLC. please start the game and go to the Character Selection page, where there will be a new checkbox under "ENTER HER WORLD". Check the box and the characters will change into DLC costumes when you achieve a high combo in match-3 games.
